birds.title: Contemplating life choices
birds.description: This is a Pied Kingfisher - a very unique kingfisher with only black and white colours. It fishes by hovering at a single place and swiftly diving in the water to catch!

astrophotography.title: Orion Nebula
astrophotography.description:
Merge of 30 images - total exposure time of 23 sec
Nikon Z50ii + Nikkor Z 180-600mm at 600mm
ISO-6400, f/6.3, 0.77sec per photo
Bortle 9 skies

astrophotography.title: The Milky Way
astrophotography.description:
Merge of top 80% of 799 images - total exposure time of 26.6 minutes
Nikon Z50ii + Nikkor Z 40mm at 40 mm
ISO-25600, f/2, 2sec per photo
Bortle 9 skies
